# nuon_deploy (Resource)

Deploy



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `build_id` (String) build ID
- `component_id` (String) component ID - must match the id of the build - will be deprecated
- `install_id` (String) install ID to deploy to

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) id
